data.question: What is the chemical formula for JLU-Liu23?
At what temperature was JLU-Liu23 synthesized?
What is the space group of JLU-Liu23?
Does JLU-Liu23 exhibit photoluminescent properties in the solid state at room temperature?
What is the BET surface area of JLU-Liu23 compared to COZ-1?
data.answer: JLU-Liu23 has a higher surface area than COZ-1.

data.question: Is JLU-Liu23 capable of enantioselective separation of chiral molecules?
What is the role of dabco in the structure of JLU-Liu23?
data.answer: Dabco acts as a linker bridging Cu4I4 clusters.

data.question: What is the maximum CO2 uptake for JLU-Liu23 at 273 K and 760 Torr?
Can JLU-Liu23 be used for the separation of CO2 and CH4?
What is the selectivity of CO2/CH4 for JLU-Liu23?
data.answer: 2.1 and 2.3 for 5% and 95%, and 50% and 50% mixtures, respectively.

data.question: What is the crystal system of JLU-Liu23?
What is the significance of the CD spectra in the study of JLU-Liu23?
data.answer: The CD spectra indicate the chiral nature of JLU-Liu23.

data.question: Is JLU-Liu23 stable in air and most organic solvents?
What is the role of chiral inducing agents in the synthesis of JLU-Liu23?
data.answer: They promote the formation of enantiomeric pairs 23P and 23M.

data.question: What is the estimated free volume of JLU-Liu23?
Does JLU-Liu23 have intrinsic homochirality?
What is the significance of the helical channels in JLU-Liu23?
data.answer: They contribute to the enantioselective separation capabilities of JLU-Liu23.

data.question: What is the Langmuir and BET surface areas for JLU-Liu23?
Can JLU-Liu23 selectively adsorb C2H6 over CH4?
What is the role of the bbimb ligand in the structure of JLU-Liu23?
data.answer: It forms DNA-like double-helical chains within the framework.
